flawed_nl_solution:
Rose cooked 10 x 9/10 = <<10*9/10=100/9>>100/9 kilograms of rice in the morning.
She had 10 - 100/9 = <<10-100/9=-10/9>>-10/9 kilogram of rice left then.
One kilogram is equal to -10/9 x 1000 = <<-10/9*1000=-10000/9>>-10000/9 grams.
So, Rose cooked -10000/9 x 1/4 = <<-10000/9*1/4=-2500/9>>-2500/9 grams of rice in the evening.
Therefore, she has -10000/9 - -2500/9 = <<-10000/9--2500/9=-2500/3>>-2500/3 grams of rice left.
#### -2500/3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 9, not 100/9. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
